name: Page Turner
description:
Co-created with Julia Zorc.

After a grammatical error leaves you in an unfamiliar town, you come to the realization that not everything is what it seems. From the outside, you’re seeing a dingy American town, but once inside, it’s like each part of the town is plunged into a different kind of storybook. There’s a circus on the main street, a dance in the residential area, pirates at the wharf, and a supernatural resident in the cemetery. Even stranger is that some of the residents have mysteriously lost their ability to speak. And the only way to solve the town’s problems seems to be through classic literature…
